phrases: We have been a comedy duo for such a long time...
I do not think I can suddenly see you as my girlfriend.
If we would met as a normal short girl and tall guy,
We would confess, and things might have gone well for us.
Risa is so shocked you can see the whites of her eyes.
What are you going to do about this?!
W-What am I going to do?
Were not you the one who told me to tell her what I was thinking?!
Just what do not you like about Risa?!
I already told you, it is not that I do not like her or anything.
Say for example I told you that these pickled radishes are now crabs.
Would you really think, Yes, that is true?
Do not say things we cannot understand!
Do not compare Risa with pickled radishes!
Let us go play cards in the room.
He asked me to give them some time alone during free time the day after tomorrow.
If we leave them alone right now...
How many times are you going to deal that finishing blow?!
I did not mean it like that.
It is just that I am worried.
I do not need you to worry about me!
It just makes me realize that this was not worth the effort at all.
I am just a pickled radish, after all.
Uh, I know I picked a bad example, but...
Well, at least you seem more cheerful.
So no matter what I say, it is just going to upset you?
I told you, did not I?
Well, that is fine by me if that is what you want, but...
So... is this how you treat guys you like?
Wh- Wh- What did you say?
Looks like they are back to normal.
Seems like they are back to their old selves.
I wonder if they will just go back to being the way they were before...
Let us chat some more after I take my bath.
Did I seem back to my old self just now?
A partner in our comedy duo?
One of the boys in class 5 just confessed to Hikari-chan!
Was it that guy she is liked all this time?
I have not told anyone yet, but the truth is, I also...
You spent the whole day together, did not you?
I told him that I like him, and the he said okay.
Everyone else is having a great time on this trip...
There is Ishida from class 4, and then from class 2 there is...
No boys allowed on this floor.
There is no need to be so aggressive.
Hey, can we have a picture taken together tomorrow?
If you feel like crying, then go ahead and cry.
Let us go back to our room, okay?
I told him to pretend that nothing happened,
If none of this had happened...
If I did not like Otani...
So, what are you going to do?
Are you going to give up on Otani-kun?
It is not a matter of giving up.
Pickled radishes cannot become crabs, right?
You are still thinking about that?
For starters, what are you going to do during free time the day after tomorrow?
If you do not want to be with Otani-kun, you and I can go around together.
I would feel bad imposing on a lovey-dovey couple anyway.
What are you going to do, Risa?
I will just find someone else.
And it is not like I really mind being around with Otani that much.
I was the one who said I wanted us to go back to the way we were before.
Avoiding him now would be pointless.
I am the one who pushed you into confessing.
I feel like this is all my fault.
What the heck are you saying?
The confession... it was just me telling him how I felt.
Anyway, I am grateful that you motivated me to do it.
Hey, do not touch me there!
Who is making all those weird noises?
Geez, you guys woke us all up.
If I am depressed, I will worry everyone.
I will just pretend that nothing happened, and go back to being the way I was before.
There is no point on brooding over it.
Let us make the most out of this class trip!
How long are you going to be sleepy, shorty!
Get a move on or you will be left behind again.
I do not want to go on feeling awkward forever.
I will just pretend nothing happened and go back to being part of our comedy duo again.
Let us get some snacks for tonight.
It is a local magazine you can only get here.
After his concert on Sapporo, he left for Hakodate for a quick vacation...
Are not we going there tomorrow?
And we will have free time...
I want to try the soft serve ice cream he recommends!
I want to have a picture taken in that exact same spot!
I told you to stop worrying about me!
That is why I am trying not to let it get to me.
You would better have brought a camera.
We cannot just take photos with our cell phones.
Looks like we do not have to worry anymore.
The morning markets, the morning markets.
Let us go eat the seafood Umibouzu recommends.
Did not you just eat breakfast?
For someone so small, you sure eat a lot.
Fine then, I will just go by myself!
But you have to go halves with me.
It really is shaped like a star.
Do not forget why we came to this specific spot in the first place!
Remember, it is your turn next!
I really do still like Otani.
But... if I tell him I like him, it will get awkward.
If we can stay like this forever, it is enough for me.
Can you take a picture for us?
'Kay, I will take one for ya.
Are you from the Kansai district?
It is a real Kansai accent!
Look, there is something over there.
But who was that tall girl?
No matter who is looking, no one would ever see me as his girlfriend.
It is your turn for a picture.
The magazine showed this spot too, right?
I do not think I can suddenly see you as my girlfriend.
If he cannot think of me as a girlfriend, it is pointless to go on liking him.
I will pretend nothing happened, and give up completely.
Should we head back to the meeting point soon?
It is red, and round, with a picture of a rabbit on it.
Did you lose it when we took that picture?
They said it has not been handed in.
Well, let us go look around the places we went to today again.
There was only about 1,000 yen in it anyway.
Do you know how much you could buy with that?!
You will be cursed for giving it up, idiot!
But it is already time to meet up.
If we are late together again, more rumors will start.
Let them say whatever they want!
If you have got time to talk such pointless crap, you have got time to keep looking!
I will take this side of the road, and you take that...
D- Do you like that wallet that much?
That is not it, you idiot!
I am trying to help you
Just when I would finally decided to give up for good...
What is the matter with you?
What are you doing that for?
G- G- G- G- Go say something to him!
This is a once in a lifetime opportunity!
I was just about to turn it in at the police station.
Are you on a class trip?
It is past the time we were supposed to meet up.
If you like, we can drop you off.
We were just about to get a taxi to take us to the train station.
Hey, have not I told you to call me Papa?
Hey boy, come help me hail a taxi.
But will there even be any taxis around here?
So, are you on a family vacation?
He always says how much he likes it here, so we come here regularly.
He may look scary, but he is a really gentle guy.
We went to the same high school.
So you have been going out since back then?
We did not go out until long after we graduated.
He confessed to me when we were in high school, but I rejected him in a big way.
We would been friends for ages, so I could not imagine dating him or anything like that.
Now we are married, and we even have a son.
Life is really hard to predict, huh?
So even pickled radishes can become crabs, huh?
Even I did not fall for Otani right away.
Otani's reply may be sorry right now,
There is no need to force myself to give up.
I am going to have to take back that Let us pretend nothing happened.
I still like you, after all.
What kind of dopey response is that?
That is what you get for saying things like that out of the blue!
I have to, since you are always slow on the uptake.
Are not you the slow one?
Just who was it that dropped their wallet?
What the heck are you talking about?!
One day I will make you regret saying sorry,
You got a problem with that?
Otani-kun, are you doing anything for Christmas?
My middle school's basketball club is having a party.
Next: A Confrontation With the Ex-Girlfriend?!
